aliases.name: update-branch
aliases.description: Pull changes from remote main and merge into current branch

aliases.name: push-main
aliases.description: Push to main and include all commit tags

aliases.name: push
aliases.description: Commit all outstanding changes and push to remote

aliases.name: pull
aliases.description: Commit all outstanding changes and pull from remote

aliases.name: publish-patch
aliases.command: gittey commit; npm version patch; npm publish; gittey push-main
aliases.description: Commit outstanding changes, bump patch version, publish, and push

aliases.name: publish-minor
aliases.command: gittey commit; npm version minor; npm publish; gittey push-main
aliases.description: Commit outstanding changes, bump minor version, publish, and push

aliases.name: publish-major
aliases.command: gittey commit; npm version major; npm publish; gittey push-main
aliases.description: Commit outstanding changes, bump major version, publish, and push
